comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: She is wife no.2, Ingeborg (née Engeström) (from en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felix_von_Luckner) See very similar photo in SMH taken at the same time - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/17467309 , which implies the date of this photo is Friday 20/5/1938. Interview with the Countess - "I believe in love at first sight ... " - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/17467452

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Wonderful!! Great sleuthing thanks beachcomber. The photograph in SMH was probably taken by Hood. This is getting more and more interesting.
